idea:
Womco Pharma LLP is a by-product of its parent company Womco Laboratories private Limited company at Navi Mumbai, India established in 2003. Previous Company has been serving the Govt & private healthcare sector for 2 decades. While Womco Pharma LLP will be focused on Exports and Private healthcare sector creating distribution network pan India

Womco Pharma specializes in Manufacturing and Trading of Sterilized Surgical Disposables with innovative design. The Products are manufactured in CE / ISO certified plant using GMP standards & are tested as per ISO / CE standards.
name: WOMCO PHARMA LLP

idea:
Servify is integrated with leading OEMs and Channel Partners, and manages end-to-end program management of their Warranty business including after-salesservice for them through its Platform.

Servify provides white-labelled Care apps and portals that become the standard operating platform for every single authorized service provider of the OEM (be it channel partners,repair service providers, logistics providers, parts suppliers, call centers and alike); thus helping the OEM deliver a unified service experience for its customers.
name: ServiceLee Techsystem Solutions Private Limited

idea:
Networrk app allows you to create a professional business presence along with a digital catalog and a product portfolio that you can share seamlessly with your prospects or clients via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, SMS, email or on any other social media channels.


If you are an individual entrepreneur or a freelancer or someone with an existing business, you can create your online business profile with the Networrk app and showcase your company details and products on the go to your clients and prospects in the most efficient way.


Website: www.networrk.in

idea: To carry on the business of Software designing, development, customization, implementation, maintenance, testing and bench marking, designing, developing and dealing in computer software packages, programs, purchase, distribute, host, (in data centers or over the web) or otherwise dealing own and third party computer software packages, programs and solutions, and to provide internet/web based applications, services and solutions, provider take up information technology related assignments on sub contracting basis, offering services onsite/off site or through development centers using owned/hired or third party infrastructure equipment, providing recruitment and HR related services, providing and taking personnel/consultants/human resources to/from other organizations, providing solutions/packages/services through applications services provider mode via internet or otherwise, to undertake IT enables services like call center management, medical and legal transcription, data processing, back office processing, accounting, HR and pay role processing, insurance claims processing, credit card processing, loans and letters of credit processing, cheque processing, data warehousing and data based management, to carry on the business of manufacturing, dealing and maintenance of computer hardware, computer systems and assembled data processors, program designs and to buy, sale or otherwise deal in such hardware and software packages and all types of tabulating machines, accounting machines, calculators, computerized telecommunication systems and network, their components, spare parts, equipment and devices and to carry on the business of establishing, running and managing institutions, school, and academics for imparting education in computer technology, offering equipment, solutions and services for Networking and network management, data center management and in providing consultancy services in all above mentioned area.

idea: Founder at Octo - Yashvi Vira Designs. Octo is an extremely unique, innovative, screen free, interactive, educational toy for kids. 100% stitched. Made in India.
name: OCTO

idea:
We have receive numerous inquiries for consulting & Engineering of chemical manufacturing plant by  chemical manufacturers finding alternative way to full fill their supply chain, which require raw material to be procure from China. Due to un-fortunate situation they were forced to procure these material from other countries at higher prices. As we know China is the major supplier of many chemicals, completely avoiding it is not possible. If we buy from other sources it will naturally effect the overall manufacturing cost, which in turn affect the product cost. The finished  products are not only consumed in India itself but also exported to world wide. Which plays vital role in export growth. As China is vital part in supply chain, we have to relay on them.


VCE has a common AIM to make self Reliable India. The vision starts with two different path which subsequently merges into final vision.


Vision 1: In order to make sure our domestic manufacturer have a supply of these chemicals. We are developing a special platform where such manufacturers procuring from China will be brought together and will understand their requirement. This platform will act as a future supply market for all the manufacturing requirement. Thus creating a domestic supply hub. for MADE IN INDIA.


Vision 2: VCE is right now involve in R&D and engineering of few chemical manufacturing process as per the demand of domestic manufacturer.  VCE along with few technical institute are developing such technologies.  The willing manufacturer can sponsor these R&D and VCE with its technical expertise will engineer cost effective & environment friendly process. The process developed by VCE will not only will be focused on quantity & quality but will also tried to put environmental issues on its first priority list.
name: VALORES CONSULTING ENGINEERS
